name: All alone (Thomas Boone)
description:
🎮 The Game

💬 Type away at a conversation generated by 4 AI's

💬 Yes, somebody needs to keep it nice and tidy

❤️ Made with love for the 2023 UDC Jam #25

⌨️ Controls

Keyboard only

💬 Type out the letters of the words that appear to keep the conversation clean


👤 Credits

Story, UI, Code, Design - Thomas Boone

Music - All Alone by D SMILEZ;

agrav by Distant 294;

SchoolYard Haze by Jan Pitkanen;

We Are All Alone by The Saw Vs An Oldest Oak

❤️ Thanks for playing and take care!
